title_en: MysIDC 11.16: Status of River Water Quality based on Main Pollutants
title_ms: MysIDC 11.16: Status Kualiti Air Sungai Berdasarkan Bahan Pencemar Utama
description_en: Status of river water quality based on main pollutants, including suspended solids, biochemical oxygen demand (BOD), and ammoniacal nitrogen. This data helps assess the pollution levels of river water and categorize river basins as polluted, slightly polluted, or clean based on these parameters.
description_ms: Status kualiti air sungai berdasarkan bahan pencemar utama, termasuk pepejal tersuspensi, permintaan oksigen biokimia (BOD), dan nitrogen ammonia. Data ini membantu menilai tahap pencemaran air sungai dan mengkategorikan lembangan sungai sebagai tercemar, sedikit tercemar, atau bersih berdasarkan parameter-parameter ini.
methodology_en: Data Sourced from Department of Environment
methodology_ms: Sumber data dari Jabatan Alam Sekitar

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: total_river_basins_monitored
fields.description_en: [Integer] The total number of river basins that were monitored for water quality
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Jumlah lembangan sungai yang dipantau untuk kualiti air

fields.name: biochemical_oxygen_demand_polluted
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as polluted based on biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) levels
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai tercemar berdasarkan tahap permintaan oksigen biokimia (BOD)

fields.name: biochemical_oxygen_demand_slightly_polluted
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as slightly polluted based on biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) levels
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai sedikit tercemar berdasarkan tahap permintaan oksigen biokimia (BOD)

fields.name: biochemical_oxygen_demand_clean
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as clean based on biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) levels.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai bersih berdasarkan tahap permintaan oksigen biokimia (BOD).

fields.name: ammoniacal_nitrogen_polluted
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as polluted based on ammoniacal nitrogen levels.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai tercemar berdasarkan tahap nitrogen ammonia.

fields.name: ammoniacal_nitrogen_slightly_polluted
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as slightly polluted based on ammoniacal nitrogen levels.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai sedikit tercemar berdasarkan tahap nitrogen ammonia.

fields.name: ammoniacal_nitrogen_clean
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as clean based on ammoniacal nitrogen levels.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai bersih berdasarkan tahap nitrogen ammonia.

fields.name: polluted_suspended_solids
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as polluted based on the levels of suspended solids.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai tercemar berdasarkan tahap pepejal tersuspensi.

fields.name: suspended_solids_slightly_polluted
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as slightly polluted based on the levels of suspended solids.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai sedikit tercemar berdasarkan tahap pepejal tersuspensi.

fields.name: suspended_solids_clean
fields.description_en: [Integer] The number of river basins classified as clean based on the levels of suspended solids.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan lembangan sungai yang diklasifikasikan sebagai bersih berdasarkan tahap pepejal tersuspensi.
